title: Got banned because of 1 game.
body:
"Game 1
Pre-Game
LordUrganoth: mid
LordUrganoth: nvm
LordUrganoth: ?
LordUrganoth: uhm
LordUrganoth: no
In-Game
LordUrganoth: who the fuck plays Ziggs?
LordUrganoth: no man
LordUrganoth: play how you know best
LordUrganoth: lvl 2 gank
LordUrganoth: zyra support
LordUrganoth: rocks
LordUrganoth: he made 6 in combat
LordUrganoth: premade %%%%%%s?
LordUrganoth: we gona lose this
LordUrganoth: oh yeah
LordUrganoth: you do know
LordUrganoth: I scale off late game
LordUrganoth: right
LordUrganoth: bot is 2v1
LordUrganoth: so is top
LordUrganoth: yes you %%%%%%
LordUrganoth: keep ganking top
LordUrganoth: why cant you ward
LordUrganoth: not my job to keep you alive
LordUrganoth: then watch the fucking map
LordUrganoth: Jax fed him
LordUrganoth: score snob?
LordUrganoth: passive jg
LordUrganoth: passive jungler
LordUrganoth: leads team to shit
LordUrganoth: score snob?
LordUrganoth: or you trying to be retardedly ignorant?
LordUrganoth: no cds..."

I was playing renekton top and enemy Tryndamere was being babysat. Ganked non stop. My mid was trying to tilt me flaming me for my score. But I barely said anything this game. I understand it is unlikely that this is the sole reason I got my 14 days account suspension,but I'd like to see the rest. When I login to see the suspension notification,there is only this game displayed where I got reported. Any way I can see the others,if there are any?

replies.body: Hate speech gives you an instant 14 day ban. Even for just one game.

> [{quoted}](name=RallerenP,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=8Ez1La20,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-06-07T19:04:16.608+0000)
>
> Hate speech gives you an instant 14 day ban. Even for just one game.

well,that clears it. Thanks for the quick response! :)

That looks qualified.

As a warning, you get put on the rito watchlist after a 14-day, even minor stuff will get you a perm. The expectation is you toe the line instead of testing it.

>  retardedly ignorant?

Personal favorite....its an interesting combination to point out. So they are learning impaired and uneducated

Seems redundant.
